Module jBomberman
Package view

Class DecoratorPlayerCharacter

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.GameCharacter
model.PlayerCharacter
view.DecoratorPlayerCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<GameCharacter>, Iterable<Integer>, ReleaseBehavior, VisitorAcceptor, FootageDeath, FootageFuncs, FootageWin
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratedPlayerCharacter
public abstract class DecoratorPlayerCharacter extends PlayerCharacter implements Iterable<Integer>, FootageFuncs, ReleaseBehavior, FootageDeath, FootageWin
Decorated version of a PlayerCharacter to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way. With this class the decorator mimics the methods of its component.

      Description copied from class: GameCharacter

    • accept

      public void accept(Visitor visitor)
      Description copied from interface: VisitorAcceptor
      Accept method for Visitor Pattern, used to encapsulation of moving algorithms of characters. An object accept a visitor and the visit method of the Visitor activates it specific overloading visit method , consistent with the polymorphism of the acceptor object
      Specified by:
      accept in interface VisitorAcceptor
      Overrides:
      accept in class PlayerCharacter
      Parameters:
      visitor - visitor to accept
